Posts.Content: According to Placidway,Usually, women treated for breast cancer may also utilize the benefits of holistic and complementary medical techniques that involve acupuncture, meditation and yoga to help alleviate and eradicate side effects caused by treatments, maintain positive attitudes, and help ensure overall improvement in quality of health and life issues.
Posts.Title: Breast Cancer After Thyroid Cancer?

Posts.Content: Hello, where are you from? Placidway has effective treatments worldwide and maybe you find something in your country. You may also ask them for advice or see some testimonials. I'm not a specialist, but I sow some prestigious clinics and oncologist which offer affordable treatments. Or maybe you find some new procedures..Hope it helped.. Good luck and wish your sister all the best!

I'm not that into those details, but if you want, I cand give you her e-mail and talk more details, maybe she knows and has an appropriate answer. Good luck!

Posts.Title: when do you just stop treatment

Posts.Content: Placidway explains: Recent developments and medical advances that combat breast cancer offer today's women more choices, less discomfort and improved prognosis. Today, thanks to the continuous education about Cancer, an earlier detection is possible and more women than ever before are able to survive breast cancer. Research and information about Breast Cancer and other type of Cancer is constantly helping to increase life’s quality, and the chances for remission and elimination of cancer for people around the world is more and more possible every day.
